author: cms-btv-pog
body: Backport of changes which have been included already in 71x: remove producer from b-tag DQMOffline sequence, use of CHS jets, do JEC on the fly, add a PU-jets category, improvement of the config. files to run the b-tag DQM code locally or on the GRID...
title: Backport from 70x/71x releases (JEC onfly, PU classification...)
